briefTitle: A Study of Monthly Risedronate for Osteoporosis
officialTitle: A Phase III, Multicenter, Double-blind, Randomized, Active-controlled, Parallel Group, Non-inferiority Study Comparing 150 mg Risedronate Monthly With 5 mg Risedronate Daily in the Treatment of Postmenopausal Osteoporosis (PMO)
summary: The purpose of this trial is to study the efficacy of a single-dose monthly dosing regimen as compared to the standard daily dosing regimen of risedronate 5 mg daily.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent Change From Baseline in Lumbar Spine Bone Mineral Density (BMD) at Month 12-Endpoint in Women With Postmenopausal Osteoporosis, Primary Efficacy Population
